params._orderId: The ID of the order to cancel.
The ID of the order to confirm.

params._paymentTokenAddress: The address of the ERC20 token used for payments.

params._cropId: The ID of the crop to retrieve.

params._orderId: The ID of the order to retrieve.

params._description: A brief description of the crop.
params._imageUrl: A URL or IPFS hash pointing to an image of the crop.
params._price: The price of a single unit of the crop.
params._quantity: The total quantity of the crop available.

params._cropId: The ID of the crop to purchase.
params._quantity: The quantity of the crop to purchase.

cancelOrder(uint256).notice: Allows either the buyer or seller to cancel a pending order.

confirmOrder(uint256).notice: Allows the buyer to confirm an order, releasing funds to the seller's withdrawable balance.

getCrop(uint256).notice: Retrieves the details of a specific crop.

getOrder(uint256).notice: Retrieves the details of a specific order.

listCrop(string,string,uint256,uint256,s.notice: Allows a farmer to list a new crop for sale.

purchaseCrop(uint256,uint256).notice: Allows a consumer to purchase a specified quantity of a listed crop.

totalCrops().notice: Returns the total number of crops listed.

withdrawFunds().notice: Allows a seller to withdraw their accumulated funds from confirmed orders.
